CustomField.description: This field is not required and is manually populated. When true, this field indicates that the product this feature is for is a syndicated loan (which is a bank facility that is offered by a group of lenders). Additionally, it indicates that the financial institution this product feature is for is the primary agent of the syndicated loan. The agent is a lead bank or underwriter of the loan, known as the arranger, the agent or the lead lender. This lender may put up a proportionally bigger share of the loan, or it may perform duties such as dispersing cash flows among the other syndicate members and administrative tasks.
CustomField.label: Is Syndication Agent
